definition: to pardon/to absolve/to exempt from punishment
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

sentences.english: Then evaluates and considers the actualities of the prerogative of mercy that in our country.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上对我国赦免权的现状进行评价和反思。

sentences.english: Psalm 25 is a cry to God for pardon of great sin.
sentences.chinese: 诗篇廿五篇是向神呼求赦免大罪的祷告。

sentences.english: Phoenix the pray to the god, please forgive the sin of her father.
sentences.chinese: 凤英向天父祷告，请天父赦免她的罪。

sentences.english: Her husband has nullified them, and the LORD will release her.
Is not that people in Nineveh were forgiven at that time?
sentences.chinese: 那尼尼微人当时不就被赦免了吗？

sentences.english: The blood of Jesus Christ not only redeems us, it justifies us.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣基督的宝血不单拯救我们，也赦免了我们的罪。

sentences.english: Now I beg you, forgive my sin and come back with me, so that I may worship the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 现在求你赦免我的罪，同我回去，我好敬拜耶和华。

sentences.english: He who speaks against the truth of apostolical pardons, let him be anathema and accursed.
sentences.chinese: 他对谁讲的真理使徒的赦免，让他被诅咒和诅咒。

sentences.english: They told the executioner to let him go, and pardoned him.
sentences.chinese: 就让刽子手停止行刑，赦免了王延寿。

sentences.english: They are amnestied by the president.
Jesus forgives all of us that repents of their sin.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣赦免全人类，虽然人类保有原罪。

sentences.english: Workaholism may be the only socially condoned disease.
sentences.chinese: 工作迷可能是唯一一种受社会赦免的疾病。

sentences.english: This sinner has confessed her sins and begged for absolution and forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 这名罪人已经认罪，并祈求赦免和宽恕。

sentences.english: 29But whoever blasphemes against the Holy Spirit will never be forgiven; he is guilty of an eternal sin.
sentences.chinese: 凡亵渎圣灵的，却永不得赦免，乃要担当永远的罪。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter analyses the forming and the developments of the prerogative of mercy in China.
sentences.chinese: 第四章分析我国宪法上赦免权的形成及其发展。

sentences.english: For the sake of your name, Lord, forgive my iniquity, for it is great.
sentences.chinese: 上主，为了你圣名的原故，求你赦免我重大的愆尤。

definition: an execution/to put sb to death
to admit to a crime/to plead guilty
restored to one's official post/to send sb back to his former post
